Maven Site Indexer plugin

An easy way to index your maven site and give it a nice ajax search box.

It's as easy as:

  • putting searchbox.html in site/resources (you can customize it if you have a good javascript-fu)
  • putting search.js in site/js (just put it as it is)
  • mvn site:site index:index (don't site-deploy it, as it overvwrites the added tags - still working on this :P)
  • open up your site and enjoy your nice and free search box!

Wanna see an example? Look at the top right corner of this page ;) Wanna try it? It's apache licensed and you can find it on GitHub
